
   Heterogeneous
   End Heterogeneous

   Ext Forcing
   End Ext Forcing
End Chemistry

   Simulation parameters

     Spatial Dimensions
        Longitude points = 192
        Latitude  points = 96
        Vertical  points = 60
     End Spatial Dimensions


     Numerical Control
        Implicit Iterations = 11
     End Numerical Control

     Bndy Conds
     End Bndy Conds

     Surface Flux
     End Surface Flux


     Surface Deposition
     End Surface Deposition


     Version Options
        model = ECHAM
        machine = Intel
        architecture = hybrid
        vec_ftns = on 
        namemod = on
     End Version Options

     Outputs

       File
       End File

     End Outputs

   End Simulation Parameters

ENDSIM
